action.selector: .artikel_informatie > div[style="clear: both; float: left; position: relative; margin: 5px 0px 15px 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; width: 280px; color: #cccccc; font-size: 10px;"]
div[style$="background: #ff0000 url(/img/ads/bhosted.png) top left no-repeat; margin-bottom: 10px;"]
div[style="padding: 0px; margin: 10px 0px; height: 100px; width: 898px; background-color: #4C89F9; border: 1px solid #4C89F9"]
div[style="position: relative; width: 300px; height: 250px; overflow: hidden;"]
